messages.message:
@Dominic Fannjiang ideally we should provide a mechanism to have `TracedThreadPoolExecutors` which can have tracing support out of the box. I have created a JIRA (https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/OBS-1012) to track this.

For now to enable tracing across `ThreadPoolExecutors` you can use the following steps -
1. Pass the current active span to the child thread you want to use tracing in. You can get the active span using `tracing_utils.get_active_span()`
2. In the child thread use the parent span passed earlier to activate tracing. You can use `tracing_utils.activate_span(parent_span)`
3. Now you can use all the tracing functions like start_span etc in the child thread.
Can you please try out this approach and let me know if you face any problems.

c.c. @sudeep @raman.goel
